channel.title: powerWCer please
channel.description:
hey people know i need all the PowerWCing scripters to not be offended as i am only saying what i have experienced (i dont know about other people!),
i dont know if anyone else is having these problems or maybe its just me but almost all of the powerWCers have somthing wrong with them.
Some dont have anti randoms, some dont drop the logs (instead keep trying to cut tree), some cant even cut the trees! and some like for me (surajd's Wood smasher) dont even start working after the setup bit!
like i said dont be offended if you are a powerWCer.
so all im asking for is.... a fairly simple PowerWCer that has all the anti-randoms and anti-bans ( i want to use it overnights). i also want it to drop the logs now i really dont mind if it cuts 1 log then drops 1 logs then cuts 1 and drops 1 etc... or if it cuts a full invent then drops them all. aslong as it works then ill be happy!
please this really isnt a hard script to do and i would have wrote the script myself if i knew how!
thanks pm me
ps. sorry for how long this text was :P
